education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Engineering

projects.name: Serverless E-commerce Website using AWS
description: Built a ReactJS e-commerce site, integrated Stripe for payments, and utilized AWS services (DynamoDB, SES, S3) for data management.
Designed serverless architecture with API Gateway, Simple Queue Service, and CloudWatch for scaling ECS tasks.
Managed payment invoices with AWS services, including AWS Lambda, Simple Email Service, DynamoDB, and S3
Achieved an average URL request latency of 4.89ms, enhancing user experience and ensuring seamless performance in an e-commerce environment.

projects.name: Comparative Analysis of Multiple ML Models and Real-Time Translation
description: Created a custom dataset consisting of images of English alphabets, numbers, and commonly used signs using American Sign Language (ASL) for training and testing the models.

Developed machine learning models like Decision Tree, Support Vector Machine, with Convolutional Neural Networks achieving the highest accuracy of 96% in hand gesture recognition, benefiting individuals with hearing impairments.
Implemented a combination of Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) and Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks for real-time gesture recognition.

projects.name: Spam SMS Detection Using Natural Language Processing
description: Developed a robust Spam SMS Detection system achieving 97% accuracy and 96% precision using Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning techniques.
Utilized a variety of algorithms including Support Vector Machine, Random Forest, and Extra Trees Classifier, with Extra Trees Classifier demonstrating the best performance.
Applied ensemble learning techniques such as Gradient Boosting, AdaBoost, and XGBoost with consistent performance, enhancing accuracy and precision in spam detection.
